With a randomly generated binary number with 2 masks, 
all the possible combinations are as follows for: 1*111010101*01

11111010101101
11111010101001
10111010101101
10111010101001

This current run of 2 masks took 28ms

With a randomly generated binary number with 4 masks,
all the possible combinations are as follows for: 1**11100*0100*000

11111100101001000
11111100101000000
11111100001001000
11111100001000000
11011100101001000
11011100101000000
11011100001001000
11011100001000000
10111100101001000
10111100101000000
10111100001001000
10111100001000000
10011100101001000
10011100101000000
10011100001001000
10011100001000000

This current run of 4 masks took 23ms

With a randomly generated binary number with 6 masks,
all the possible combinations are as follows for: 10010**0**1000*0*100

10010110111000101100
10010110111000100100
10010110111000001100
10010110111000000100
10010110101000101100
10010110101000100100
10010110101000001100
10010110101000000100
10010110011000101100
10010110011000100100
10010110011000001100
10010110011000000100
10010110001000101100
10010110001000100100
10010110001000001100
10010110001000000100
10010100111000101100
10010100111000100100
10010100111000001100
10010100111000000100
10010100101000101100
10010100101000100100
10010100101000001100
10010100101000000100
10010100011000101100
10010100011000100100
10010100011000001100
10010100011000000100
10010100001000101100
10010100001000100100
10010100001000001100
10010100001000000100
10010010111000101100
10010010111000100100
10010010111000001100
10010010111000000100
10010010101000101100
10010010101000100100
10010010101000001100
10010010101000000100
10010010011000101100
10010010011000100100
10010010011000001100
10010010011000000100
10010010001000101100
10010010001000100100
10010010001000001100
10010010001000000100
10010000111000101100
10010000111000100100
10010000111000001100
10010000111000000100
10010000101000101100
10010000101000100100
10010000101000001100
10010000101000000100
10010000011000101100
10010000011000100100
10010000011000001100
10010000011000000100
10010000001000101100
10010000001000100100
10010000001000001100
10010000001000000100

This current run of 6 masks took 26ms

At this point showing all the combinations will take far too long to output in this document. 
so im going to just print the elapsed time to this document for numbers of stars
and print the stars to my console

This current run of 8 masks took 33ms

This current run of 10 masks took 56ms

This current run of 12 masks took 91ms

This current run of 14 masks took 185ms

This current run of 16 masks took 467ms

This current run of 18 masks took 1416ms

This current run of 20 masks took 4406ms

This current run of 22 masks took 16514ms

This current run of 24 masks took 62982ms

This current run of 26 masks took 242461ms

Anything past this point starts to take a crazy amount of time
